name: Flag of Bangladesh Drawn by using SVG
body:
![Muminur](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-ejoAsUHvukE/VzN2PpZ6WFI/AAAAAAAAAl0/qOm-9ppI1cIz7-1YFtblUbYTC6V1QNOKACL0B/w748-d-h1118-p-rw/bd%2Bflag.png)
***
<svg height="400" width="200">
    <rect x="5" y="0" width="200" height="100" fill="#15744C" />
    <circle cx="95" cy="50" r="40" fill="red" />
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="7" height="300" fill="black" />

</svg>
